title: Woodie
author: Woodie
created_time: March 08, 2023, 11:25:50 AMLast edit: November 15, 2023, 07:50:15 PM by Woodie
content: credit: dogtopiaHope am not too late for this one, but I believe most of us here observe the International Women's day and just wanted us to join the world in commemorating this day for the womenfolk.Remember reading a quote by Margaret Fuller which reads out as ‚ÄúIf you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.‚Äù Applying this message to the world of crypto lets spread the word and help people know financial freedom does exist , lets not keep this knowledge to ourselves.HAPPY INTERNATIONAL WOMENS DAY 2023

comments.author: sokani
comments.created_time: March 08, 2023, 01:42:55 PMLast edit: March 08, 2023, 01:56:55 PM by sokani
comments.body: According to the words of Albert Camus "Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow; don't walk behind me, I may not lead; walk beside me, and just be my friend." Happy women's day to all the amazing women on this forum. We join the whole world in celebrating you to today and we want to let you know that you are special and loved.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I don‚Äôt think there are too many confirmed women on here. Happy Women's Day to the genuine females on here though, we appreciate everything you do for us. The world can‚Äôt run well without good women, both those in business & those who stay home to do the tough but rewarding job of bringing up children.Some good women to follow in bitcoin -1. comments.author: vleroybrown
comments.body: Mothers and Daughter's day, or just label it womens can not be defined by modern science day.Either way you call it, recognizing a full day for those who like celebrating!
